component.name: DIY Layout Creator
component.summary: Multi platform circuit layout and schematic drawing tool

description.p: DIY Layout Creator (DIYLC in short) is a freeware drawing tool developed with help of the large online community of DIY electronics enthusiasts. The goal is to provide a simple interface and enough power to let the user draw schematics, board/chassis layouts and guitar wiring diagrams quickly and without a steep learning curve. Also, it is built around a flexible open source framework that may be used to draw pretty much anything.

ul.li: [Bug Fix] macOS: issues with scrollable toolbar that prevent it from starting on mac machines.
